TopicTitle: A very special gift from Shapeways! (Ended)

Articles.Content:
[TABLE=width: 700, align: center]

[TR]

[TD=colspan: 2]**Hello everyone!**

Have you ever wanted to hold a Kerbal in your hand, look him right in the eye and maybe even congratulate him for surviving a particularly perilous trip? 

We have just the thing for you: the generous people at [Shapeways](http://www.shapeways.com/) are looking to give away a free 3D printed Kerbal figurine of choice^1^ to one of our forum members.

Entering this giveaway is very easy: all you need is a forum account. Answer the question in the form below for a shot at the prize! We will pick a winner at random from all valid entries. The contest will run until the moment we release 1.0!

 **** [**Visit the Kerbal Space Program shop on Shapeways!**](http://www.shapeways.com/shops/kerbalspaceprogram)

^1^ Any item from the KSP store on Shapeways can be chosen with the exception of the complete IVA crew.[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]

**We'd like to congratulate stanz25 for winning our Shapeways figurine giveaway! He's won his pick of a** **3D printed Kerbal figurine**  **from the Shapeways store.**

Check out the 3D printed Kerbal figurines for yourself at [http://www.shapeways.com/shops/kerbalspaceprogram](http://www.shapeways.com/shops/kerbalspaceprogram)

[/TD]

[TD]![0FEUoCm.png](http://i.imgur.com/0FEUoCm.png)[/TD]

[/TR]

[/TABLE]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-30T11:02:12Z" title="08/30/2015 11:02  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 30, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**
Just entered, good luck everyone! And thanks for the awesome giveaway!

Wow, making an entry makes me feel.. Nervous.

Crossing my fingers!
Make it 10 prizes ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) we deserve it.
Of course I entered ;0.
just entered. XD it would be great to have a 3d kerbal around ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
And on a Space Game related forum I still had to think for a minute.. \*bangs head on desk\*

Awsome giveaway ! Thanks !

> 
> And on a Space Game related forum I still had to think for a minute.. \*bangs head on desk\*

Same for me ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
All of my yes to look Jeb dead in the eye and say; You're invincible aren't you?

It's unlikely that I will win, but I decided to enter nonetheless.

I'm curious about whether I'll want the Stargazing Kerbal or a Kerbin plushie...
I'll feel bad if I win but I won't be if I lose... hm...

I've got a Jebediah Kerman and a Gene Kerman from Shapeways. I can honestly say they are the coolest things. Then again I also have an oil painting of Jebediah and a canvas print of a first orbit experience in my apartment... I think I enjoy KSP. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
As if i wasn't hyped enough for 1.0, this definitively kicked me over the edge more than a big bucket of coffee. Good luck to everyone and thank you guys for beeing awesome!

Methinks I got the answer right... Not sure though. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

\*crosses fingers\*
Even if we lose or win, we can all thank SQUAD and Shapeways for their support and love. Good luck everyone
I think I too got it right.

I just realized I answered the first question wrong. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Oh well, I tried.

Entered simply for the chance to own a Kerbal eating wands.....

Loved you guys at Squad from the start:D
i'm in also hyyyyypeee

Looks as if I will have a 99.999999918% chance of losing... 

Best of luck to you all!
XD, I entered twice. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
When you guys pick my name, please remember its r4pt0r, with a zero.
Hahaha this is awesome Kasper! Shapeways you da man!

Hahaha this is awesome Kasper! Shapeways you rock!
